definition: to die/to depart this life (euphemism)/same as 去世
to resign/to dismiss/to decline/to take leave/ballad (archaic poetic genre)/variant of 詞|词[ci2]

sentences.english: her mother died and her father followed.
sentences.chinese: 母亲辞世后不久，父亲也紧随其后，悄然离去。

sentences.english: Tolstoy became a kind of prophet in his old age, during the last few decades.
sentences.chinese: 晚年，在其辞世前的一二十年，托尔斯泰象个传道者。

sentences.english: Word of Benson's demise spread quickly among her pursuers.
sentences.chinese: 本森辞世的消息迅速在她的追求者中传开。

sentences.english: His wife died after an agonizing three-year siege of cancer.
sentences.chinese: 他的妻子和癌症抟斗三年后辞世。

sentences.english: THE mother of former President Sam Nujoma, Kuku Helvi-Mpingana Kondombombolo, has died at the age of 108.
sentences.chinese: 纳米比亚前总统努乔马的母亲辞世，享年108岁。

sentences.english: Countries show promise to do such as yunlang stepmother, such as send peacefully.
sentences.chinese: 国秀答应了如寄给云朗做继母，如寄安详辞世。

sentences.english: Martin Luther King Jr. died with no more than one half of his dreams fulfilled.
sentences.chinese: 马丁路德金带着仅完成一半的梦想溘然辞世。

sentences.english: Many people would sooner die than think; In fact, they do so.
sentences.chinese: 人多有不及思索而辞世者，究其实，信然。
她于1817年辞世，时年不足42岁。

sentences.english: Confucius disciples of the Queen who died or subduction city at this time mostly wild.
sentences.chinese: 孔子的嫡传弟子们此时大多辞世或隐没市野。

sentences.english: Now, Henge has passed away for many years, youth of our generation had gone and was unable to return back.
sentences.chinese: 而今，痕戈已经辞世多年，青春也已一去不回。

sentences.english: When the mother still cherishs 5 younger sister, world of demit of father traffic accident.
sentences.chinese: 当母亲还怀着五妹的时候，父亲车祸辞世。

definition: to die/to depart this mortal coil
to live to the (ripe) age of
lit. to fly on a crane to the Western Paradise/fig. to pass away (idiom)
to die/to depart from the world forever
to leave one's mortal frame (idiom)/to die
see 駕鶴西去|驾鹤西去[jia4 he4 xi1 qu4]
